title: PrimeTime Oil Control
description: Put an end to midday shininess. Designed for oily, sensitive, and problem-prone skin, our Prime Time Oil Control is clinically proven to control excess shine. Apply this silicone- and oil-free primer prior to your bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation for evenly textured, shine-free coverage all day.

title: Glytone Exfoliating Body Wash, 6.7-Ounce Package
description: To retexturize.   Glycolic acid cleanser helps exfoliate dry, rough skin in the shower.  8.8% glycolic acid.
